original_title: President Ranil awards freehold land deeds in Batticaloa
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has symbolically distributed freehold deeds to 192 individuals from 13 divisional secretariat divisions in the Batticaloa District out of the 27,595 qualified families, under the ‘Urumaya’ freehold deeds program, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
The ‘Urumaya’ national program is expected to grant 2 million freehold land deeds to people across the island.
